! A stack of books: In the beginning was the ball. In a bowl mix all this was that there is in the world. And apart from that there was nothing of the ball. Gradually the ball pulled her emptiness and began to increase in size. When the ball is hollow and filled, it emerged polar energy. Energy gradually acquire a material substance. Bright took the image of women. She called herself Einhasad. Black took the form of a man. He called himself a Grand Prix Cain ... Initially formed by light (= Einhasad) and darkness (= Gran Kain), and around, a system of light and darkness. [Quest _10293_SevenSignsForbiddenBook book_q10293_0.htm|Choose this book]
